result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: The Vatican let it be known recently that...
result.ga: Chuir an Vatacáin in iúl le déanaí go
result.orig: Chuir an Vatacáin in iúl le déanaí go
result.html: Chuir an Vatacáin in iúl le déanaí goThe Vatican let it be known recently that...
result.ponchtml: Ċuir an Vatacáin in iúl le déanaí goThe Vatican let it be known recently that...

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.

result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.
